title: eddy_cuda10.2
description: A tool for correcting eddy currents and movements in diffusion data

out.title: out
out.description: Output file containing the corrected images

eddy_parameters.title: eddy_parameters
eddy_parameters.description: Text file containing subject movement and EC-induced field parameters for each volume

rotated_bvecs.title: eddy_rotated_bvecs
rotated_bvecs.description: File containing the reoriented b-vectors for diffusion analysis

rotated_bvecs_slr.title: eddy_rotated_bvecs_for_SLR
rotated_bvecs_slr.description: File with rotated b-vectors for least-squares reconstruction

command_txt.title: eddy_command_txt
command_txt.description: Text file documenting the command line used to run eddy

input_parameters.title: eddy_values_of_all_input_parameters
input_parameters.description: List of all parameters used by eddy

movement_rms.title: eddy_movement_rms
movement_rms.description: Summary of total movement for each volume

restricted_movement_rms.title: eddy_restricted_movement_rms
restricted_movement_rms.description: Estimates movement RMS while disregarding translation in the PE direction

shell_alignment_parameters.title: eddy_post_eddy_shell_alignment_parameters
shell_alignment_parameters.description: Text file with rigid body movement parameters between different shells

shell_PE_translation_parameters.title: eddy_post_eddy_shell_PE_translation_parameters
shell_PE_translation_parameters.description: Translation parameters along the PE direction between different shells

outlier_n_stdev_map.title: eddy_outlier_n_stdev_map
outlier_n_stdev_map.description: Map of the number of standard deviations for outliers

outlier_n_sqr_stdev_map.title: eddy_outlier_n_sqr_stdev_map
outlier_n_sqr_stdev_map.description: Map of the number of squared standard deviations for outliers

outlier_free_data.title: eddy_outlier_free_data
outlier_free_data.description: Original data with outlier slices replaced, only if --repol was set

movement_over_time.title: eddy_movement_over_time
movement_over_time.description: Text file with movement parameters over time, only if --mporder > 0

mbs_first_order_fields.title: eddy_mbs_first_order_fields
mbs_first_order_fields.description: 4D image file of partial derivative fields, only if --estimate_move_by_susceptibility is set

cnr_maps.title: eddy_cnr_maps
cnr_maps.description: 4D image file with SNR and CNR maps, only if --cnr_maps is set

residuals.title: eddy_residuals
residuals.description: 4D image file of residuals, only if --residuals is set
